feed.title: NMA
feed.subtitle: This is a site description coming from _config,yml so that it will appear in your document head meta (for Google search results), in your feed.xml site description, and in your footer (if you want it to).

entry.title: Test from Mobile
entry.content:

  • image upload almost worked
entry.summary: Testing the admin authoring experience from a phone.

entry.title: Test Post Title from Front Matter

link.title: Test Post Title from Front Matter

entry.content:
Inline Test Post Title

This is a test post. This is a paragraph as part of the main content of the post. This post was created to see how the post/page title gets created and for testing netlify cms features. Modifies via Netlify CMS on 12-11-19.
